faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Common questions about our pricing and features

questions.question: Is there a free option?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer a completely free plan with basic receipt tracking and AI categorization. It's perfect for freelancers just getting started.

questions.question: Can I change plans?
questions.answer: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time with no additional fees or complicated processes.

questions.question: Are there any contracts?
questions.answer: No long-term contracts. Our monthly and yearly plans are flexible, allowing you to cancel anytime without penalties.

questions.question: How secure is my data?
questions.answer: We use bank-level encryption and secure cloud storage to protect your financial information. Your data privacy is our top priority.

questions.question: Do you offer refunds?
questions.answer: We provide a 30-day money-back guarantee on our pro plan. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your first month's payment.

how_it_works.title: How Receipt AI Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Turn physical receipts into digital data in three simple steps.

steps.title: Upload & Digitize
steps.text: Securely drag and drop your receipt images or PDFs. We support bulk uploads and all standard formats.

steps.title: Smart Extraction
steps.text: Our AI engine instantly extracts key data—including Merchant, Date, and Totals—eliminating manual data entry.

steps.title: Auto-Categorize & Store
steps.text: Data is automatically tagged with expense categories and securely archived, ready for search or one-click export.

hero_section.title: Insights and Tips
hero_section.subtitle: Explore the latest trends in expense management.

hero_section.title: Empowering freelancers to focus on work, not paperwork
hero_section.subtitle: We believe that managing expenses shouldn't cost you your sanity. Receipt AI was built to help creators, builders, and hustlers reclaim their time from the chaos of receipts.

story_section.title: It started with a lost receipt
paragraphs: In 2023, our founder David was auditing his expenses for a big client project. He realized he had lost a $450 receipt for materials—money he could no longer expense. He spent 3 hours digging through email trash bins and old jean pockets, only to come up empty.
That frustration sparked an idea: What if a tool could 'read' a receipt the moment you got it, categorize it instantly, and store it where you couldn't lose it? No manual data entry, no shoeboxes.
Today, Receipt AI processes thousands of receipts for freelancers who would rather be building their business than bookkeeping.
story_section.image_alt: Founder working late at a desk with papers

core_values.title: Values we build by
core_values.subtitle: We are guided by a few simple principles that keep us focused on what matters: your time and your peace of mind.
core_values.image_alt: Founder working late at a desk with papers

values.title: Simplicity First
values.description: If it requires a tutorial, we failed. We build tools that feel invisible so you can focus on your craft.

values.title: Data Privacy
values.description: Your financial data is yours. We encrypt everything and will never sell your purchase history to advertisers.

values.title: User Obsessed
values.description: We don't build for 'enterprises.' We build for the freelancer, the creator, and the one-person shop.

cta.title: Ready to reclaim your time
cta.subtitle: Stop wrestling with receipts. Start building your business instead.
